hover-zoom.name: Hover Zoom
hover-zoom.description: Hold shift over any image to magnify.

theme-injector.name: Theme Injector
theme-injector.description: Select a custom CSS theme from your themes folder to completely reskin the client.

zen-mode.name: Zen Mode
zen-mode.description: Instantly hide all sidebars and focus entirely on your conversation.

quick-edit.name: Quick Edit
quick-edit.description: Press Up Arrow to edit your last sent message.

stealth-mode.name: Stealth Mode
stealth-mode.description: Blocks the 'User is typing...' indicator from being sent to others.
